long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Creator Inflow browser extension is designed for creators who wish to generate referral links for H&M brand websites (&Other Stories, Arket, COS, Monki, Weekday and H&M Beauty)  effortlessly. With just a click on the extension, creators can instantly generate a unique referral link ready for sharing on social media platforms. There's no limit to the number of links they can create, and they can earn commissions on any resulting sales.
